attributes.action: reduce VAT on service and labour charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reducing VAT on service and labour charges from 17.5% to 5% will create jobs and help prevent the nation's infrastructure and machinery from falling to rack and ruin during the recession. Examples of service and labour charges include those associated with building, decorating, gardening, and the repair of vehicles and household appliances.
